data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Nowadays, customers can shop online and write reviews of the products they have purchased. Describe some of the ways this affects consumers' decisions."
data.answer: Nowadays, due to the development of technology and economics, online shopping has become very popular among people. Several factors will affect people's choices while shopping online. One of the most significant ones is the reviews. Usually, people will be encouraged to buy something they do not really need by reading some kind words about that product online. On the other hand, they may decide not to buy something due to the bad words written online about that product. In conclusion, we should balance both good and bad reviews and figure out which of them are real, and buy something that we need. （102 字）
